targets.rawSql:
select
  $__time(timestamp),
  max(temp_input) as max_temp_input
from (
    select
      timestamp,
      avg(temp_input) as temp_input,
      concat(chip, '-', feature) as metric
    from
      telegraf_sensors
    where
      host = '$host'
      and temp_input is not null
      and temp_input > 0
      and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(temp_input) as value,
    concat(chip, '-', feature) as metric
from
    telegraf_sensors
where
    host = '$host'
    and temp_input is not null
    and temp_input > 0
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(fan_input) as value,
    concat(chip, '-', feature) as metric
from
    telegraf_sensors
where
    host = '$host'
    and feature ~ '^fan'
    and fan_input is not null
    and fan_input < 10000 -- 20000 rpm? ekhm?
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(usage_active) as cpu_usage_active
from
    telegraf_cpu
where
    host = '$host'
    and cpu = 'cpu-total'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

with
  telegraf_linux_cpu2 as ((
    select
      timestamp,
      sum(throttle_total_time) as throttle_total_time
    from telegraf_linux_cpu
    where
      host = '$host'
      and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  ) timestamp(timestamp))
select
  $__time(timestamp),
  throttle_time_ms*1.0/(diff_seconds*1000.0)*100.0 as throttle_percentage
from (
  select
    timestamp,
    sum(throttle_time_ms) as throttle_time_ms,
    sum(diff_seconds) as diff_seconds
  from (
    select
      t1.timestamp, 
      (case when t1.throttle_total_time >= t2.throttle_total_time then t1.throttle_total_time-t2.throttle_total_time else null end) as throttle_time_ms,
      datediff('s', t1.timestamp, t2.timestamp) as diff_seconds
    from telegraf_linux_cpu2 t1 
    lt join telegraf_linux_cpu2 t2
  )
  sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(load1) as load1,
    avg(load5) as load5,
    avg(load15) as load15
from
    telegraf_system
where
    host = '$host'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(used_percent) as mem_used_percent
from
    telegraf_mem
where
    host = '$host'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    100.0-avg(available_percent) as mem_notavailable_percent
from
    telegraf_mem
where
    host = '$host'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(used_percent) as swap_used_percent
from
    telegraf_swap
where
    host = '$host'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
  $__time(timestamp),
  avg(scaling_cur_freq)*1000 as scaling_cur_freq
from
  telegraf_linux_cpu
where
  host = '$host'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

with
  telegraf_net2 as (
    select timestamp, bytes_recv, bytes_sent, packets_recv, packets_sent
    from telegraf_net
    where
      host = '$host'
      and interface = '$net_interface'
      and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  )
select
  time,
  bytes_recv*1.0/diff_seconds as bytes_recv_rate,
  bytes_sent*1.0/diff_seconds as bytes_sent_rate,
  packets_recv*1.0/diff_seconds as packets_recv_rate,
  packets_sent*1.0/diff_seconds as packets_sent_rate
from (
  select
    $__time(timestamp),
    sum(bytes_recv) as bytes_recv,
    sum(bytes_sent) as bytes_sent,
    sum(packets_recv) as packets_recv,
    sum(packets_sent) as packets_sent,
    sum(diff_seconds) as diff_seconds
  from (
    select
      t1.timestamp, 
      (case when t1.bytes_recv >= t2.bytes_recv then t1.bytes_recv-t2.bytes_recv else null end) as bytes_recv,
      (case when t1.bytes_sent >= t2.bytes_sent then t1.bytes_sent-t2.bytes_sent else null end) as bytes_sent,
      (case when t1.packets_recv >= t2.packets_recv then t1.packets_recv-t2.packets_recv else null end) as packets_recv,
      (case when t1.packets_sent >= t2.packets_sent then t1.packets_sent-t2.packets_sent else null end) as packets_sent,
      datediff('s', t1.timestamp, t2.timestamp) as diff_seconds
    from telegraf_net2 t1
    lt join telegraf_net2 t2
  )
  sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(tcp_established) as tcp_established,
    avg(tcp_syn_sent) as tcp_syn_sent,
    avg(tcp_syn_recv) as tcp_syn_recv,
    avg(tcp_fin_wait1) as tcp_fin_wait1,
    avg(tcp_fin_wait2) as tcp_fin_wait2,
    avg(tcp_time_wait) as tcp_time_wait,
    avg(tcp_close) as tcp_close,
    avg(tcp_close_wait) as tcp_close_wait,
    avg(tcp_last_ack) as tcp_last_ack,
    avg(tcp_listen) as tcp_listen,
    avg(tcp_closing) as tcp_closing,
    avg(tcp_none) as tcp_none,
    avg(udp_socket) as udp_socket
from
    telegraf_netstat
where
    host = '$host'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select 
  time,
  used_percent as space_used_percent,
  (inodes_used*1.0/inodes_total*100) as inodes_used_percent
from (
  select
    $__time(timestamp),
    max(used_percent) as used_percent,
    avg(inodes_used) as inodes_used,
    avg(inodes_total) as inodes_total,
    path
  from
    telegraf_disk
  where
    host = '$host'
    and path = '$disk_path'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

with
  telegraf_diskio2 as (
    select timestamp, read_bytes, write_bytes
    from telegraf_diskio
    where
      host = '$host'
      and name = '$diskio_name'
      and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  )
select
  time,
  read_bytes*1.0/diff_seconds as read_bytes_rate,
  write_bytes*1.0/diff_seconds as write_bytes_rate
from (
  select
    $__time(timestamp),
    sum(read_bytes) as read_bytes,
    sum(write_bytes) as write_bytes,
    sum(diff_seconds) as diff_seconds
  from (
      select
          t1.timestamp, 
          (case when t1.read_bytes >= t2.read_bytes then t1.read_bytes-t2.read_bytes else null end) as read_bytes,
          (case when t1.write_bytes >= t2.write_bytes then t1.write_bytes-t2.write_bytes else null end) as write_bytes,
          datediff('s', t1.timestamp, t2.timestamp) as diff_seconds
      from telegraf_diskio2 t1
      lt join telegraf_diskio2 t2
  )
  sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

with
  telegraf_diskio2 as (
    select timestamp, io_time, weighted_io_time
    from telegraf_diskio
    where
      host = '$host'
      and name = '$diskio_name'
      and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  )
select
  time,
  io_time*1.0/(diff_seconds*1000)*100 as io_utilization_percent,
  weighted_io_time*1.0/(diff_seconds*1000) as average_queue_depth
from (
  select
    $__time(timestamp),
    sum(io_time) as io_time,
    sum(weighted_io_time) as weighted_io_time,
    sum(diff_seconds) as diff_seconds
  from (
    select
        t1.timestamp, 
        (case when t1.io_time >= t2.io_time then t1.io_time-t2.io_time else null end) as io_time,
        (case when t1.weighted_io_time >= t2.weighted_io_time then t1.weighted_io_time-t2.weighted_io_time else null end) as weighted_io_time,
        datediff('s', t1.timestamp, t2.timestamp) as diff_seconds
    from telegraf_diskio2 t1
    lt join telegraf_diskio2 t2
  )
  sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(iops_in_progress) as iops_in_progress
from
    telegraf_diskio
where
    host = '$host'
    and name = '$diskio_name'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(usage_percent) as usage_percent
from
    telegraf_docker_container_cpu
where
    host = '$host'
    and container_name = '$docker_container_name'
    and cpu = 'cpu-total'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select 
  time,
  (usage*1.0/"limit"*100) as usage_percent
from (
  select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(usage) as usage,
    avg("limit") as "limit"
  from
    telegraf_docker_container_mem
  where
    host = '$host'
    and container_name = '$docker_container_name'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

with
  telegraf_docker_container_net2 as (
    select timestamp, rx_bytes, tx_bytes, tx_packets, rx_packets
    from telegraf_docker_container_net
    where
      host = '$host'
      and container_name = '$docker_container_name'
      and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  )
select
  time,
  rx_bytes*1.0/diff_seconds as rx_bytes_rate,
  tx_bytes*1.0/diff_seconds as tx_bytes_rate,
  tx_packets*1.0/diff_seconds as tx_packets_rate,
  rx_packets*1.0/diff_seconds as rx_packets_rate
from (
  select
    $__time(timestamp),
    sum(rx_bytes) as rx_bytes,
    sum(tx_bytes) as tx_bytes,
    sum(tx_packets) as tx_packets,
    sum(rx_packets) as rx_packets,
    sum(diff_seconds) as diff_seconds
  from (
      select
          t1.timestamp, 
          (case when t1.rx_bytes >= t2.rx_bytes then t1.rx_bytes-t2.rx_bytes else null end) as rx_bytes,
          (case when t1.tx_bytes >= t2.tx_bytes then t1.tx_bytes-t2.tx_bytes else null end) as tx_bytes,
          (case when t1.tx_packets >= t2.tx_packets then t1.tx_packets-t2.tx_packets else null end) as tx_packets,
          (case when t1.rx_packets >= t2.rx_packets then t1.rx_packets-t2.rx_packets else null end) as rx_packets,
          datediff('s', t1.timestamp, t2.timestamp) as diff_seconds
      from telegraf_docker_container_net2 t1
      lt join telegraf_docker_container_net2 t2
  )
  sample by $__interval fill(null)
)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(power_draw) as power_draw
from
    telegraf_nvidia_smi
where
    host = '$host'
    and name = '$nvidia_name'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(utilization_gpu) as utilization_gpu,
    avg(utilization_memory) as utilization_memory,
    avg(utilization_encoder) as utilization_encoder,
    avg(utilization_decoder) as utilization_decoder
from
    telegraf_nvidia_smi
where
    host = '$host'
    and name = '$nvidia_name'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(temperature_gpu) as temperature_gpu
from
    telegraf_nvidia_smi
where
    host = '$host'
    and name = '$nvidia_name'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(c_percentage) as percentage,
    concat('percentage_', name) as metric
from
    telegraf_power_supply
where
    host = '$host'
    and type = 'Battery'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(c_capacity) as capacity,
    concat('capacity_', name) as metric
from
    telegraf_power_supply
where
    host = '$host'
    and type = 'Battery'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

WITH ordered AS (
    SELECT
        timestamp AS ts,
        c_percentage AS pct,
        lag(timestamp)     OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY timestamp) AS prev_ts,
        lag(c_percentage)  OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY timestamp) AS prev_pct
    FROM telegraf_power_supply
    WHERE
        host = '$host'
        and type = 'Battery'
        and status = 'Discharging'
        and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
valid AS (
    SELECT
        (ts - prev_ts) / 1000000L AS delta_s,  -- seconds (micros)
        (prev_pct - pct) AS pct_drop
    FROM ordered
    WHERE prev_ts IS NOT NULL
      AND (ts - prev_ts) < 65000000L          -- only intervals < 65s (micros)
)
SELECT
    --sum(delta_s) AS total_seconds,
    --sum(pct_drop) AS total_pct_drop,
    (sum(pct_drop) / NULLIF(sum(delta_s), 0)) * 3600 AS avg_pct_drop_per_hour,
    (100 * sum(delta_s) / NULLIF(sum(pct_drop), 0)) / 3600 as est_operating_time_hours
FROM valid

WITH ordered AS (
    SELECT
        timestamp AS ts,
        c_percentage AS pct,
        lag(timestamp)     OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY timestamp) AS prev_ts,
        lag(c_percentage)  OVER (PARTITION BY name ORDER BY timestamp) AS prev_pct
    FROM telegraf_power_supply
    WHERE
        host = '$host'
        and type = 'Battery'
        and status = 'Charging'
        and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
),
valid AS (
    SELECT
        (ts - prev_ts) / 1000000L AS delta_s,  -- seconds (micros)
        (pct - prev_pct) AS pct_incr
    FROM ordered
    WHERE prev_ts IS NOT NULL
      AND (ts - prev_ts) < 65000000L          -- only intervals < 65s (micros)
)
SELECT
    --sum(delta_s) AS total_seconds,
    --sum(pct_incr) AS total_incr_incr,
    (sum(pct_incr) / NULLIF(sum(delta_s), 0)) * 3600 AS avg_pct_incr_per_hour,
    (100 * sum(delta_s) / NULLIF(sum(pct_incr), 0)) / 3600 as est_charging_time_hours
FROM valid

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(power_now)/1000000 as power_now,
    concat(type, '_', name) as metric
from
    telegraf_power_supply
where
    host = '$host'
    and type = 'Battery'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(voltage_now)/1000000 as voltage_now,
    concat('[V]', type, '_', name) as metric
from
    telegraf_power_supply
where
    host = '$host'
    and type = 'USB'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(current_now)/1000000 as current_now,
    concat('[A]', type, '_', name) as metric
from
    telegraf_power_supply
where
    host = '$host'
    and type = 'USB'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

list.definition: select distinct host from telegraf_cpu where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.name: host
list.query: select distinct host from telegraf_cpu where $__timeFilter(timestamp)

list.definition: select distinct interface from telegraf_net where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.name: net_interface
list.query: select distinct interface from telegraf_net where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

list.definition: select distinct path from telegraf_disk where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.name: disk_path
list.query: select distinct path from telegraf_disk where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

list.definition: select distinct name from telegraf_diskio where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.name: diskio_name
list.query: select distinct name from telegraf_diskio where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

list.definition: select distinct container_name from telegraf_docker_container_cpu where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.name: docker_container_name
list.query: select distinct container_name from telegraf_docker_container_cpu where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

current.value: NVIDIA RTX 2000 Ada Generation Laptop GPU

list.definition: select distinct name from telegraf_nvidia_smi where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.name: nvidia_name
list.query: select distinct name from telegraf_nvidia_smi where host = '$host' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
